main event: A bluish-green object exploded in the sky over San Francisco, California on August 2, 1957.
interesting points: Witnesses reported seeing the object drop straight to earth before exploding,Several persons called newspapers and radio stations to report the sighting,Western Airlines mentioned a pilot saw the same object at 11,000 feet near Lancaster, PA,The object was described as being round, approximately the size of a baseball, and white in color,Weather conditions were calm and clear at the time of the sighting.
witness description: observers including local residents and a pilot
